name: UBX-CFG-NMEA
description: Extended NMEA protocol configuration V1. Get/set the NMEA protocol configuration. This message is deprecated in protocol versions greater than 23.01. Use UBX-CFG-VALSET, UBX-CFG-VALGET, UBX-CFG-VALDEL instead.

fields.name: posFilt
fields.description: Enable position output for failed or invalid fixes

fields.name: mskPosFilt
fields.description: Enable position output for invalid fixes

fields.name: timeFilt
fields.description: Enable time output for invalid times

fields.name: dateFilt
fields.description: Enable date output for invalid dates

fields.name: nmeaVersion
fields.description: NMEA protocol version. This byte is also used for gpsOnlyFilter (bit 4) and trackFilt (bit 5). Possible version values: 0x4b (v4.11), 0x41 (v4.10), 0x40 (v4.0), 0x23 (v2.3), 0x21 (v2.1). (Not all versions available in all products).

fields.name: gpsOnlyFilter
fields.description: Restrict output to GPS satellites only. This bit is part of the nmeaVersion byte.

fields.name: trackFilt
fields.description: Enable COG output even if COG is frozen. This bit is part of the nmeaVersion byte.

fields.name: numSV
fields.description: Maximum number of SVs to report per TalkerId. 0 = unlimited, 8 = 8 SVs, 12 = 12 SVs, 16 = 16 SVs.

fields.name: compat
fields.description: Enable compatibility mode. Might be needed for certain applications when customer's NMEA parser expects a fixed number of digits in position coordinates.

fields.name: limit82
fields.description: Enable strict limit to 82 characters maximum.

fields.name: highPrec
fields.description: Enable high precision mode. This flag cannot be set in conjunction with either compatibility mode or Limit82 mode (not supported for protocol versions less than 20.01).

fields.name: svNumbering
fields.description: Configures the display of satellites that do not have an NMEA-defined value. 0 = Strict (Satellites are not output), 1 = Extended (Use proprietary numbering).
